title: MBTI Test
description: Measure your MBTI tendencies across energy, perception, decisions, and planning.

questions.prompt: Your ideal weekend usually starts with...

options.label: Plans with people and active conversations.
Quiet time, solo hobbies, or one-to-one connection.

questions.prompt: When solving a problem, you trust...

options.label: Concrete facts and what has worked before.
Patterns, possibilities, and future outcomes.
Consistency, objective logic, and fairness by rule.
People impact, values, and emotional context.

questions.prompt: How do you feel about deadlines?

options.label: I like clear plans and early closure.
I adapt as I go and keep options open.

questions.prompt: Pick all statements that often match your style.
questions.description: Multi-choice question: select one or more.

options.label: I think out loud while developing ideas.
I spot practical details others miss.
I naturally model future what-if scenarios.
I check whether everyone feels heard.
I organize early to reduce stress later.
I keep plans flexible until the last useful moment.

questions.prompt: After a socially intense week, how restored do you feel?

options.label: I prefer proven methods and realistic steps.
I enjoy experimentation and conceptual leaps.

questions.prompt: In team conflict, your first instinct is...

options.label: Clarify facts and define a rational path.
Read emotions and repair trust first.
Structured milestones and clear commitments.
Responsive improvisation based on new inputs.

ISTJ.title: ISTJ
ISTJ.summary: Methodical and dependable. You value clear standards and execution.

ISFJ.title: ISFJ
ISFJ.summary: Supportive and steady. You balance detail with practical care for people.

INFJ.title: INFJ
INFJ.summary: Insightful and principled. You connect long-range vision with human meaning.

INTJ.title: INTJ
INTJ.summary: Strategic and independent. You optimize systems for future impact.

ISTP.title: ISTP
ISTP.summary: Calm and adaptive. You solve real-world problems with efficient action.

ISFP.title: ISFP
ISFP.summary: Grounded and expressive. You seek authenticity and tangible harmony.

INFP.title: INFP
INFP.summary: Reflective and value-driven. You prioritize purpose and inner alignment.

INTP.title: INTP
INTP.summary: Analytical and curious. You enjoy conceptual depth and intellectual precision.

ESTP.title: ESTP
ESTP.summary: Bold and pragmatic. You read situations quickly and move decisively.

ESFP.title: ESFP
ESFP.summary: Engaging and spontaneous. You energize environments and focus on experience.

ENFP.title: ENFP
ENFP.summary: Creative and people-oriented. You connect ideas and inspire momentum.

ENTP.title: ENTP
ENTP.summary: Inventive and strategic. You challenge assumptions and explore options.

ESTJ.title: ESTJ
ESTJ.summary: Organized and direct. You bring structure, clarity, and follow-through.

ESFJ.title: ESFJ
ESFJ.summary: Collaborative and dependable. You keep groups connected and coordinated.

ENFJ.title: ENFJ
ENFJ.summary: Guiding and empathetic. You lead through relationships and shared growth.

copyBlocks.text: You show people-focused leadership with balanced traits from neighboring styles.
Your pattern strongly points to relational leadership and values-based decision making.

ENTJ.title: ENTJ
ENTJ.summary: Decisive and goal-driven. You align people and systems toward high standards.

fallback.title: Balanced Axis Mix
fallback.summary: Your responses indicate a blended type with near-even axis scores.
fallback.details: You may adapt style by context. Consider retaking in another mood or setting.
